tools.name: will_executor
tools.description: REACTIVE tool: Executes will by transferring assets

tools.name: social_checker
tools.description: ACTIVE tool: Checks social media login status

config.intent:
```json
{
  "agent_type": "will",
  "required_features": [
    "will creation",
    "dead man's switch",
    "inactivity monitoring",
    "document transfer",
    "recipient designation"
  ],
  "constraints": [
    "inactivity period: 6 days",
    "trigger condition: user not online"
  ]
}
```
